name: 卢卡斯·布拉斯
name_full: 卢卡斯·布拉斯 Lucas Blas
introduction: Film and TV actor born in Madrid, Spain. Blas has worked as a child model for many brands. Lucas de Blas' contribution to directors like Ángel Gómez Hernández is impressive, there is that air of naturalness on stage that always makes an impression. He is one of those actors that you look forward to seeing in another film to please you with their acting and story.Intrigue, Terror are the genres Lucas de Blas prefers when choosing the films he wants to act in. After years of experience he has managed to specialise in these genres and has therefore received many roles.
